info.title: Azure Communication Service Call Automation APIs
info.description: Azure Communication Service Call Automation APIs

parameters.name: Repeatability-Request-ID
parameters.description: If specified, the client directs that the request is repeatable; that is, that the client can make the request multiple times with the same Repeatability-Request-Id and get back an appropriate response without the server executing the request multiple times. The value of the Repeatability-Request-Id is an opaque string representing a client-generated unique identifier for the request. It is a version 4 (random) UUID.

parameters.name: Repeatability-First-Sent
parameters.description: If Repeatability-Request-ID header is specified, then Repeatability-First-Sent header must also be specified. The value should be the date and time at which the request was first created, expressed using the IMF-fixdate form of HTTP-date. Example: Sun, 06 Nov 1994 08:49:37 GMT.

202.description: Returns the cancel all media operations response.

200.description: Returns the start continuous Dtmf recognition response.
Returns the stop continuous Dtmf recognition response.

204.description: Returns no content for stop dialog response.

200.description: Returns the start call recording response.

204.description: Returns the stop call recording response.

202.description: Returns the pause call recording response.
Returns the resume call recording response.

MediaStreamingTransportType.description: The type of transport to be used for media streaming, eg. Websocket

MediaStreamingContentType.description: Content type to stream, eg. audio, audio/video

MediaStreamingAudioChannelType.description: Audio channel type to stream, eg. unmixed audio, mixed audio

RejectCallRequest.description: The request payload for rejecting the call.

incomingCallContext.description: The context associated with the call.

TransferCallResponse.description: The response payload for transferring the call.

operationContext.description: The operation context provided by client.

playSources.description: The source of the audio to be played.

playTo.description:
The list of call participants play provided audio to.
Plays to everyone in the call when not provided.

playOptions.description: Defines options for playing the audio.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

PlaySourceType.description: Defines the type of the play source

playSourceCacheId.description: Defines the identifier to be used for caching related media

fileSource.description: Defines the file source info to be used for play

textSource.description: Defines the text source info to be used for play

ssmlSource.description: Defines the ssml(Speech Synthesis Markup Language) source info to be used for play

loop.description: The option to play the provided audio source in loop when set to true

uri.description: Uri for the audio file to be played

text.description: Text for the cognitive service to be played

sourceLocale.description:
Source language locale to be played
Refer to available locales here: <seealso href="https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=stt-tts" />

voiceName.description:
Voice name to be played
Refer to available Text-to-speech voices here: <seealso href="https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/speech-service/language-support?tabs=stt-tts" />

ssmlText.description: Ssml string for the cognitive service to be played

RecognizeInputType.description: Determines the type of the recognition.

playPrompt.description: The source of the audio to be played for recognition.

interruptCallMediaOperation.description: If set recognize can barge into other existing queued-up/currently-processing requests.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

interruptPrompt.description: Determines if we interrupt the prompt and start recognizing.

initialSilenceTimeoutInSeconds.description: Time to wait for first input after prompt (if any).

targetParticipant.description: Target participant of DTMF tone recognition.

speechLanguage.description: Speech language to be recognized, If not set default is en-US

interToneTimeoutInSeconds.description: Time to wait between DTMF inputs to stop recognizing.

maxTonesToCollect.description: Maximum number of DTMF tones to be collected.

stopTones.description: List of tones that will stop recognizing.

endSilenceTimeoutInMs.description: The length of end silence when user stops speaking and cogservice send response.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

tones.description: List of tones to be sent to target participant.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

DialogInputType.description: Determines the type of the dialog.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.
The value to identify context of the operation.

GetParticipantsResponse.description: The response payload for getting participants of the call.

values.description: List of the current participants in the call.

nextLink.description: Continue of the list of participants

CallParticipant.description: Contract model of an ACS call participant

AddParticipantResponse.description: The response payload for adding participants to the call.

participant.description: List of current participants in the call.

operationContext.description: The operation context provided by client.

RemoveParticipantResponse.description: The response payload for removing participants of the call.

operationContext.description: The operation context provided by client.

MuteParticipantsResponse.description: The response payload for muting participants from the call.

operationContext.description: The operation context provided by client.

UnmuteParticipantsResponse.description: The response payload for unmuting participants from the call.

operationContext.description: The operation context provided by client.

RecordingContentType.description: The content type of call recording.

RecordingChannelType.description: The channel type of call recording.

RecordingFormatType.description: The format type of call recording.

StartCallRecordingRequest.description: The request payload start for call recording operation with call locator.

recordingStateCallbackUri.description: The uri to send notifications to.

audioChannelParticipantOrdering.description:
The sequential order in which audio channels are assigned to participants in the unmixed recording.
When 'recordingChannelType' is set to 'unmixed' and `audioChannelParticipantOrdering is not specified,
the audio channel to participant mapping will be automatically assigned based on the order in which participant
first audio was detected.  Channel to participant mapping details can be found in the metadata of the recording.

channelAffinity.description:
The channel affinity of call recording
When 'recordingChannelType' is set to 'unmixed', if channelAffinity is not specified, 'channel' will be automatically assigned.
Channel-Participant mapping details can be found in the metadata of the recording.
///

externalStorage.description: Optional property to specify location where recording will be stored

CallLocator.description: The locator used for joining or taking action on a call.

channel.description: Channel number to which bitstream from a particular participant will be written.

participant.description:
The identifier for the participant whose bitstream will be written to the channel 
represented by the channel number.

RecordingStorageType.description: Defines the type of external storage

blobStorage.description: Defines the blob storage location where the recording will be stored

BlobStorage.description: Used to specify Blob container url to recording storage

containerUri.description: Url of a container or a location within a container

AddParticipantFailed.description: The failed to add participant event.

correlationId.description: Correlation ID for event to call correlation. Also called ChainId for skype chain ID.

operationContext.description: Used by customers when calling mid-call actions to correlate the request to the response event.

resultInformation.description: Contains the resulting SIP code/sub-code and message from NGC services.

operationContext.description: Used by customers to set the context for creating a new call. This property will be null for answering a call.

sequenceNumber.description: The Sequence Number of the event

RecognitionType.description:
Determines the sub-type of the recognize operation.
In case of cancel operation the this field is not set and is returned empty

collectTonesResult.description:
Defines the result for RecognitionType = Dtmf
Would be replaced by DtmfResult after server sdk renewed

dtmfResult.description: Defines the result for RecognitionType = Dtmf

choiceResult.description: Defines the result for RecognitionType = Choices

speechResult.description: Defines the result for RecognitionType = Speech and SpeechOrDtmf

label.description: Label is the primary identifier for the choice detected

recognizedPhrase.description:
Phrases are set to the value if choice is selected via phrase detection.
If Dtmf input is recognized, then Label will be the identifier for the choice detected and phrases will be set to null

SpeechResult.description: The speech status as a result.
